channel.title: Getting started on Lettre site
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on Lettre site

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This documentation is written for lettre 0.7. Please use https://docs.rs/lettre/0.6.2/lettre/ for lettre 0.6. Lettre is an email library that allows creating and sending messages. It provides: An easy to use email builder Pluggable email transports Unicode support (for emails and transports, including for sender et recipient addresses when compatible) Secure defaults (emails are only sent encrypted by default)
